```{python}
import sqlite3
import pandas as pd

with sqlite3.connect('quakes.db') as connection:
    pd.read_csv('tsunamis.csv').to_sql(
        name="tsunamis",
        con=connection,
        index=False,
        if_exists='replace'
    )
```

import sqlite3

with sqlite3.connect('quakes.db') as connection:
